alert.note: Alert for Baxter; Eastern, Central, and Southern Searcy County Higher Elevations; Izard; Marion; Searcy County Lower Elevations; Stone (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 07 at 5:42PM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Stone, northeastern Searcy, western Izard, southeastern Marion and southeastern Baxter Counties through 615 PM CDT... At 542 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Rush, or 11 miles southeast of Yellville, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Calico Rock... Norfork... Pineville... Gorby... Herron... Rush... Lion Hill... Advance... Cartney... Culp... Blanchard Springs Campground... Big Flat... Allison... Gunner Pool Campground... Barkshed Campground... Push Mountian... Buffalo City... Fifty-Six... Optimus... Cozahome... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Baxter; Eastern, Central, and Southern Searcy County Higher Elevations; Izard; Marion; Searcy County Lower Elevations; Stone
